databaseChangeLog.changeSet:
Create the first stored procedure
Creates a stored procedure [dbo].[Sp_UsmanTest5] with sample data insertion into UsmanTest1 and UsmanTest2 tables. \
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sp_UsmanTest5] AS begin insert into UsmanTest1(PersonID, LastName , FirstName, Address, City ) values (1,'usman','UL haq','Pakistan','LHR') insert into UsmanTest2(PersonID, LastName , FirstName, Address, City ) values (1,'usman','UL haq','Pakistan','LHR')
SELECT * FROM UsmanTest1 SELECT * FROM UsmanTest2
End;

Alter the first stored procedure
Alter a stored procedure [dbo].[Sp_UsmanTest2] with sample data insertion into UsmanTest1 and UsmanTest2 tables. \
Alter PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sp_UsmanTest5] AS begin insert into UsmanTest1(PersonID, LastName , FirstName, Address, City ) values (1,'usman','UL haq','Pakistan','LHR') insert into UsmanTest2(PersonID, LastName , FirstName, Address, City ) values (1,'usman','UL haq','Pakistan','LHR')
SELECT * FROM UsmanTest1 union SELECT * FROM UsmanTest2
End;
